= 605 | blank_name = FIPS code | blank_info = 46-00700 | blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 1267262 | website = }} Alcester is a city in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is in Union County, and 820 people lived there at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== City of Alcester website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1893 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in South Dakota
